price: ហើយមនុស្ស(គ្មានជំនឿ)បែរជាសួរថាៈ តើនៅពេលដែល ខ្ញុំបានស្លាប់ទៅ ខ្ញុំនឹងត្រូវគេធ្វើឱ្យរស់ឡើងវិញមែនឬ?
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu al-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukh'raju ḥayyan
